features: CONVENIENT: 0.7 Cu. Ft. microwave oven is the ideal anywhere you need it small microwave solution for home or office
EASY TOUCH PRESETS: Six pre-programmed cooking options, including popcorn, potato, pizza and more
VERSATILE DEFROST: Features speed defrost setting and defrost by weight
EVEN COOKING: Rotating glass turntable helps cook food evenly

body.description: Save counter space with this compact 0.7 cubic foot microwave oven from Avanti. The perfect countertop microwave oven for the dorm, man cave, office, studio apartment, RV, tiny home, rental room, condo, vacation home, or anywhere you need to cook food fast. This small microwave features 700 watts of cooking power, an electronic control panel, one-touch cooking programs, and a turntable with a glass try all in its compact footprint that fits perfectly on the countertop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The new oven really is a replacement well expected
reviews.reviewText: The microwave instantly heats the food evenly and really saves the needed counter space. It is a replacement for a similar model that malfunctioned. I felt that price was absolutely worth it because I had no idea that my microwave would have a heating element that didn’t work so when I got the replacement that worked better than expected, I am absolutely pleased with the new oven I purchased at Amazon.com

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have limited space in our kitchen, so the small size was necessary. We also wanted this method of door opening. Our previous one we had to pull, hard, to open the door. With grip issues, it was difficult.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT, it broke before the 3 month warranty was up. I sent a message to the company and we went back and forth for 3 weeks, every time I sent what they asked for they would ask for something else. The last few messages they said they were in touch with the shipping department and would send me the info by the end of the day. That was a week ago, now they are just resending the same message that says I will hear from them by the end of the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Got primarily for emergency preparedness, works great for that purpose
reviews.reviewText: For everyday, "grid up" microwaving, we have a larger / full size in the kitchen. I got this unit because if the grid was down, having a way to microwave food, heat up water, etc. in a microwave that doesn't draw nearly as much wattage is ideal. I have several smaller solar generators, but my sole "big one" is 3,600 watt hours & can handle a surge over 2,000 watts.At 700 watts, this microwave is well below that surge, and if using for 5-10 minutes, wouldn't take too much of a dent out of battery reserves. Heats pretty good, as long as you don't have super high expectations for how much food / how big of a container it's in, etc. Yes, there are other ways I could heat food & water in an emergency...but nothing as fast or convenient as throwing it in the microwave. And yes, even my larger microwave could run off of my big solar generator, but the full size takes 1,350 watts...nearly double this one. And, it doesn't take twice as long to get food or a cup of water hot (not boiling, but just hot enough to add hot chocolate or a powdered supplement / vitamin, etc.), so it's a net-positive to go with this microwave.I'd say if you have a smaller space, RV, or if you're also looking for a heating alternative to use in a bad situation, I'd recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a lower wattage microwave!
reviews.reviewText: This little microwave (and it is small) works pretty great for what I needed it for. I moved into a place without one, and I just needed something to reheat coffee and the occasional leftovers. This little guy does the trick! It's heavier than expected for its size, but I'm not going to be carrying it around, so that's ok.The control panel takes some getting used to - it only has pre-set times and you don't have the ability to punch in your own time like you would on a bigger (ie more functions) unit. So you have to stand there and watch it to stop it if you need something less than 30-second or full-minute increments. Again, not a huge deal as I'm warming coffee or leftovers - either way I'm not leaving them in the microwave for very long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: This unit is definitely designed to fit small spaces. It is a 700 watt, compact microwave oven with basic functions - no extra bells and whistles generally found on full size, more expensive units.This would be great for college dorm rooms, an RV trailer, or small studio apartments - any place where space is at a premium.For me, this works perfectly as I have limited countertop space and I'm not an avid microwave user. I only periodically use a microwave to reheat leftovers and make the occasional mug cake. It'd be a waste for me to invest in a fancy, full sized microwave oven.This unit is compact and functional - it's all I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small size microwave
reviews.reviewText: This microwave is as described. This is a small microwave that would be good for a small apartment or anywhere that space is at a premium. A standard sized dinner plate will fit into the microwave. This controls are basic and easy to understand. This 'style' of user interface requires you to press a 'time' button before entering in the cook time, otherwise the numbered buttons immediately start the microwave when pressed, I think the time set is the number of minutes equal to the number pressed. This is a lower wattage microwave. The unit looks nice and the metal exterior seems to be well constructed. We plan to use the microwave as a second unit to heat up items in the kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Literally doesn't work
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Bought it used. Most buttons don't work, pops breaker when running.
